mn103:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā pisinārāyaṃ viharati baliharaṇe vanasaṇḍe.
mn103:2.2: ‘cīvarahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṃ deseti, piṇḍapātahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṃ deseti, senāsanahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṃ deseti, itibhavābhavahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṃ desetī’”ti?
mn103:2.3: “Na kho no, bhante, bhagavati evaṃ hoti:
mn103:2.4: ‘cīvarahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṃ deseti, piṇḍapātahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṃ deseti, senāsanahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṃ deseti, itibhavābhavahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṃ desetī’”ti.
mn103:2.5: “Na ca kira vo, bhikkhave, mayi evaṃ hoti:
mn103:2.7: itibhavābhavahetu vā samaṇo gotamo dhammaṃ desetī’ti;
mn103:2.8: atha kinti carahi vo, bhikkhave, mayi hotī”ti?
mn103:3.1: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, ye vo mayā dhammā abhiññā desitā, seyyathidaṃ—
mn103:3.2: cattāro satipaṭṭhānā cattāro sammappadhānā cattāro iddhipādā pañcindriyāni pañca balāni satta bojjhaṅgā ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, tattha sabbeheva samaggehi sammodamānehi avivadamānehi sikkhitabbaṃ.
mn103:4.1: Tesañca vo, bhikkhave, samaggānaṃ sammodamānānaṃ avivadamānānaṃ sikkhataṃ siyaṃsu dve bhikkhū abhidhamme nānāvādā.
mn103:5.2: ‘imesaṃ kho āyasmantānaṃ atthato ceva nānaṃ byañjanato ca nānan’ti, tattha yaṃ bhikkhuṃ suvacataraṃ maññeyyātha so upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
mn103:5.3: ‘āyasmantānaṃ kho atthato ceva nānaṃ, byañjanato ca nānaṃ.
mn103:5.5: yathā atthato ceva nānaṃ, byañjanato ca nānaṃ.
mn103:5.7: Athāparesaṃ ekatopakkhikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yaṃ bhikkhuṃ suvacataraṃ maññeyyātha so upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
mn103:5.8: ‘āyasmantānaṃ kho atthato ceva nānaṃ, byañjanato ca nānaṃ.
mn103:5.10: yathā atthato ceva nānaṃ, byañjanato ca nānaṃ.
mn103:5.12: Iti duggahitaṃ duggahitato dhāretabbaṃ, suggahitaṃ suggahitato dhāretabbaṃ.
mn103:5.13: Duggahitaṃ duggahitato dhāretvā suggahitaṃ suggahitato dhāretvā yo dhammo yo vinayo so bhāsitabbo.
mn103:6.2: ‘imesaṃ kho āyasmantānaṃ atthato hi kho nānaṃ, byañjanato sametī’ti, tattha yaṃ bhikkhuṃ suvacataraṃ maññeyyātha so upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
mn103:6.3: ‘āyasmantānaṃ kho atthato hi nānaṃ, byañjanato sameti.
mn103:6.5: yathā atthato hi kho nānaṃ, byañjanato sameti.
mn103:6.7: Athāparesaṃ ekatopakkhikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yaṃ bhikkhuṃ suvacataraṃ maññeyyātha so upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
mn103:6.8: ‘āyasmantānaṃ kho atthato hi kho nānaṃ, byañjanato sameti.
mn103:6.10: yathā atthato hi kho nānaṃ, byañjanato sameti.
mn103:6.12: Iti duggahitaṃ duggahitato dhāretabbaṃ, suggahitaṃ suggahitato dhāretabbaṃ.
mn103:6.13: Duggahitaṃ duggahitato dhāretvā suggahitaṃ suggahitato dhāretvā yo dhammo yo vinayo so bhāsitabbo.
mn103:7.2: ‘imesaṃ kho āyasmantānaṃ atthato hi kho sameti, byañjanato nānan’ti, tattha yaṃ bhikkhuṃ suvacataraṃ maññeyyātha so upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
mn103:7.3: ‘āyasmantānaṃ kho atthato hi sameti, byañjanato nānaṃ.
mn103:7.5: yathā atthato hi kho sameti, byañjanato nānaṃ.
mn103:7.8: Athāparesaṃ ekatopakkhikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yaṃ bhikkhuṃ suvacataraṃ maññeyyātha so upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
mn103:7.9: ‘āyasmantānaṃ kho atthato hi sameti, byañjanato nānaṃ.
mn103:7.11: yathā atthato hi kho sameti, byañjanato nānaṃ.
mn103:7.14: Iti suggahitaṃ suggahitato dhāretabbaṃ, duggahitaṃ duggahitato dhāretabbaṃ.
mn103:7.15: Suggahitaṃ suggahitato dhāretvā duggahitaṃ duggahitato dhāretvā yo dhammo yo vinayo so bhāsitabbo.
mn103:8.2: ‘imesaṃ kho āyasmantānaṃ atthato ceva sameti byañjanato ca sametī’ti, tattha yaṃ bhikkhuṃ suvacataraṃ maññeyyātha so upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
mn103:8.3: ‘āyasmantānaṃ kho atthato ceva sameti, byañjanato ca sameti.
mn103:8.5: yathā atthato ceva sameti byañjanato ca sameti.
mn103:8.7: Athāparesaṃ ekatopakkhikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yaṃ bhikkhuṃ suvacataraṃ maññeyyātha so upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
mn103:8.8: ‘āyasmantānaṃ kho atthato ceva sameti byañjanato ca sameti.
mn103:8.10: yathā atthato ceva sameti byañjanato ca sameti.
mn103:8.13: Suggahitaṃ suggahitato dhāretvā yo dhammo yo vinayo so bhāsitabbo.
mn103:9.1: Tesañca vo, bhikkhave, samaggānaṃ sammodamānānaṃ avivadamānānaṃ sikkhataṃ siyā aññatarassa bhikkhuno āpatti siyā vītikkamo,
mn103:10.1: tatra, bhikkhave, na codanāya taritabbaṃ. Puggalo upaparikkhitabbo:
mn103:10.2: ‘iti mayhañca avihesā bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa anupaghāto, paro hi puggalo akkodhano anupanāhī adaḷhadiṭṭhī suppaṭinissaggī, sakkomi cāhaṃ etaṃ puggalaṃ akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpetun’ti.
mn103:11.2: ‘mayhaṃ kho avihesā bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa upaghāto, paro hi puggalo kodhano upanāhī adaḷhadiṭṭhī suppaṭinissaggī, sakkomi cāhaṃ etaṃ puggalaṃ akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpetuṃ.
mn103:11.3: Appamattakaṃ kho panetaṃ yadidaṃ—parassa puggalassa upaghāto.
mn103:11.5: svāhaṃ sakkomi etaṃ puggalaṃ akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpetun’ti.
mn103:12.2: ‘mayhaṃ kho vihesā bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa anupaghāto. Paro hi puggalo akkodhano anupanāhī daḷhadiṭṭhī duppaṭinissaggī, sakkomi cāhaṃ etaṃ puggalaṃ akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpetuṃ.
mn103:12.5: svāhaṃ sakkomi etaṃ puggalaṃ akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpetun’ti.
mn103:13.2: ‘mayhañca kho vihesā bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa upaghāto. Paro hi puggalo kodhano upanāhī daḷhadiṭṭhī duppaṭinissaggī, sakkomi cāhaṃ etaṃ puggalaṃ akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpetuṃ.
mn103:13.3: Appamattakaṃ kho panetaṃ yadidaṃ—mayhañca vihesā bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa upaghāto.
mn103:13.5: svāhaṃ sakkomi etaṃ puggalaṃ akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpetun’ti.
mn103:14.2: ‘mayhañca kho vihesā bhavissati parassa ca puggalassa upaghāto. Paro hi puggalo kodhano upanāhī daḷhadiṭṭhī duppaṭinissaggī, na cāhaṃ sakkomi etaṃ puggalaṃ akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpetun’ti.
mn103:15.1: Tesañca vo, bhikkhave, samaggānaṃ sammodamānānaṃ avivadamānānaṃ sikkhataṃ aññamaññassa vacīsaṃhāro uppajjeyya diṭṭhipaḷāso cetaso āghāto appaccayo anabhiraddhi.
mn103:15.2: Tattha ekatopakkhikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yaṃ bhikkhuṃ suvacataraṃ maññeyyātha so upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
mn103:15.3: ‘yaṃ no, āvuso, amhākaṃ samaggānaṃ sammodamānānaṃ avivadamānānaṃ sikkhataṃ aññamaññassa vacīsaṃhāro uppanno diṭṭhipaḷāso cetaso āghāto appaccayo anabhiraddhi, taṃ jānamāno samaṇo garaheyyā’ti.
mn103:15.4: Sammā byākaramāno, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃ byākareyya:
mn103:15.5: ‘yaṃ no, āvuso, amhākaṃ samaggānaṃ sammodamānānaṃ avivadamānānaṃ sikkhataṃ aññamaññassa vacīsaṃhāro uppanno diṭṭhipaḷāso cetaso āghāto appaccayo anabhiraddhi, taṃ jānamāno samaṇo garaheyyāti.
mn103:15.6: Etaṃ panāvuso, dhammaṃ appahāya nibbānaṃ sacchikareyyā’ti.
mn103:15.7: Sammā byākaramāno, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃ byākareyya:
mn103:15.8: ‘etaṃ, āvuso, dhammaṃ appahāya na nibbānaṃ sacchikareyyā’ti.
mn103:16.1: Athāparesaṃ ekatopakkhikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yaṃ bhikkhuṃ suvacataraṃ maññeyyātha, so upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo:
mn103:16.2: ‘yaṃ no, āvuso, amhākaṃ samaggānaṃ sammodamānānaṃ avivadamānānaṃ sikkhataṃ aññamaññassa vacīsaṃhāro uppanno diṭṭhipaḷāso cetaso āghāto appaccayo anabhiraddhi, taṃ jānamāno samaṇo garaheyyā’ti.
mn103:16.3: Sammā byākaramāno, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃ byākareyya:
mn103:16.4: ‘yaṃ no, āvuso, amhākaṃ samaggānaṃ sammodamānānaṃ avivadamānānaṃ sikkhataṃ aññamaññassa vacīsaṃhāro uppanno diṭṭhipaḷāso cetaso āghāto appaccayo anabhiraddhi taṃ jānamāno samaṇo garaheyyāti.
mn103:16.5: Etaṃ panāvuso, dhammaṃ appahāya nibbānaṃ sacchikareyyā’ti.
mn103:16.6: Sammā byākaramāno, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃ byākareyya:
mn103:16.7: ‘etaṃ kho, āvuso, dhammaṃ appahāya na nibbānaṃ sacchikareyyā’ti.
mn103:17.1: Tañce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuṃ pare evaṃ puccheyyuṃ:
mn103:17.2: ‘āyasmatā no ete bhikkhū akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpitā’ti?
mn103:17.3: Sammā byākaramāno, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃ byākareyya:
mn103:17.4: ‘idhāhaṃ, āvuso, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃ, tassa me bhagavā dhammaṃ desesi, tāhaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhāsiṃ.
mn103:17.5: Taṃ te bhikkhū dhammaṃ sutvā akusalā vuṭṭhahiṃsu, kusale patiṭṭhahiṃsū’ti.
mn103:17.6: Evaṃ byākaramāno kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na ceva attānaṃ ukkaṃseti, na paraṃ vambheti, dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākaroti, na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānuvādo gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchatī”ti.
mn103:17.8: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
